templates.title: Pi-hole速 Updatelists
templates.name: pihole-updatelists
templates.description: The Pi-hole速 is a DNS sinkhole that protects your devices from unwanted content without installing any client-side software. This is a fork of the Pi-hole速 application that adds the ability to update the lists of blocked domains and regexes.
templates.note: A black hole for Internet advertisements. This is a fork of the Pi-hole速 application that adds the ability to update the lists of blocked domains and regexes.
